description.zh-CN: 千禧年美学风格，采用玻璃态、气泡装饰和青蓝渐变。展现千禧年怀旧、趣味数位美学和Y2K审美。千禧年设计美学采用玻璃态、气泡装饰和青蓝渐变。营造千禧代怀旧和活泼数字美学。
description.en-US: Millennium design aesthetics with glassmorphism, bubble decorations, cyan-blue gradients, and metallic textures. Captures the futuristic spirit and nostalgic charm of late 90s digital culture and early 2000s design trends for nostalgic digital experiences Evokes millennium aesthetic with glassmorphism and playfulness Perfect for retro applications, creative projects, and nostalgic experiences This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. millennial nostalgia and playful digital aesthetics.
